title.narrative: OUTPUT 5.4 PROGRAMME PLANNING MONITORING AND CROSS SECTORAL COORDINATION

description.narrative: Output 5.4 Programme Planning Monitoring And Cross Sectoral Coordination, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5. Program Effectiveness

mailing-address.narrative: Plot 9 George Street PO Box 7047 Kampala

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 5.4 Programme Planning Monitoring And Cross Sectoral Coordination

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the development and approval of the 2021 UNSDCF Joint workplan that is aligned to the 2021-2025 United Nations Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework (UNSDCF) and the National Development Plan III. UCO achieved quality standards in partnership cooperation agreement and budget management, field monitoring, donor proposal/report writing and resource mobilization. Despite two waves of restrictions resulting from COVID-19 lockdowns, UNICEF achieved minimum standards in the monitoring function, internal and external deadlines for donor reporting. UNICEF successfully implemented the competitive call for partners conducted in 2020 and similar process for the disability programme in 2021. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2022
